name: Squeak Greek Antique
description:
Squeak Greek Antique tells a story of a man, a Greek immigrant in New York, who's living a hard life in the dim reality of the 21st century. His father is no longer alive and that leaves him in charge of the family business - the antique shop. With the help of father's former friends, he puts his father's shop back on its feet and eventually moves back to his homeland.

This game is part of Miz Jam 1. It must have been done uder 48 hours of work. Theme was common art kit:  https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

Game is missing some planned features like load/save, more items variety, better code. But the time is limited. I still consider myself a beginner (I finished my 1st game 3 months ago)

Enjoy!
